-e ---

# Raub

ر ب ح r-b-h rob:gain, profit, success, victory ⇔ rapture
ر ب ب r-b-b rebe:rise:grow rabbi:master

𓂝 𓍯 𓄿 𓏏 𓂝 | robbery | harhobat ≈ ḫʳubut 𒄷𒁍𒌓 ʳḫubut
𓂝 𓍯 𓄿 𓏏 𓂝 | robbery | o'robatori ryöstö@FIN ruberia(s) rablás rapinato ограбле́ние ograblénije
𓂝 𓍯 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 | robber | 'robberio < grabitës grab
𓂝 𓍯 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓀜 𓀀 | robber, he who is robbed | rapinatore (Rauben-Tuer) ^^^
𓂝 𓍯 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓅪 𓀀 | robber | a'Räuber Araber ;) розбі́йник grabić!
𓂝 𓍯 𓂡 | rob | steal (goods), rob (someone) | a-rob

𓎛 𓂝 𓄿 𓀜 | robbery | trap > грабі́ж hrabíž > Raub, rob +++
𓎛 𓂝 𓄿 𓀜 | robbery | ძარცვა ʒarcva سرقت serqat

ر ع ب r-æ-b rob:terror

𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 | lion | lion ל < ⲗⲁⲃⲟ < Räuber
𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 | lion | Mai mayor ⇔ 𓏇 𓇋 𓅱 𓃠

ر ب د r-b-d à-butt 𓃭 {sit}

rob™ robbed robbery plunder

hubut 𒄷𒁍𒌓 ʳḫubut
hubti 𒄷𒌒𒋾 ʳḫubti
hubti ša 𒄷𒌒𒋾𒃻 ʳḫubti
hubussunu 𒄷𒁍 𒋢𒉡 , 𒄷𒁍𒍖 𒋢𒉡
habāte 𒄩𒁀𒀀𒋼 , 𒆸𒀀𒋼 ʳḫabāte
habāti 𒄩𒁀𒀀𒋾 ʳḫabāti
ahbuta 𒄴𒁍𒋫 aḫbuta
ihtabbata 𒄴𒋰𒁀 𒋫 iḫtabbata
ihtanabbatā 𒄴𒋫𒀮𒁀𒋫 iḫtanabbatā
ihtanabbatū 𒄴𒋫𒀮𒁀𒌅 , 𒄴𒋫𒀮𒁀𒌅

𓅱 𓈙 𓂋 𓅪 | be despoiled(beraubt) |
